name: ChronoWAV
description:
Jam Site: GranadaJam - Global Game Jam 2017

Diversifiers: The colour and the shape:A colour-based game that can also be played by people who have any kind of difficulty seeing colour.

Spaced:Played using only the spacebar - no mouse, no other inputs.

Platforms: MS Windows

Tools And Technologies: Unity (any product)

Technology Notes: FLStudio for the music.

Credits: Isabel Aguilar, Juan Hernández, Ignacio Segura
